body:
Hi Agnieszka,
I think the update failed in your case, because I see some old dates on your components.
You should try to update again, but if you are in trouble you could try this procedure (manual update): 1) go to: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/)
2) click on "clone or download"/Download ZIP [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/USeBxRwGdK9iQJY7ZLdqwvSQyliJCugbVbmr-DJGhEIXSxudJjv0V*Qjyjp0C5s6J7e0xJy-QgvbJUDlM-ZFystojYFqVyIO/01.png)
3) Download and extract the folder wherever you want on your machine 4) Open the folder and open "userObjects" [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/USeBxRwGdK8QAmxDwb25nlziiVO8FcN3HK9nPBiGJ3eN4LxQMmv*pIeBRcgP2yqPe4iOd6tJ6U0DlnMVznqeXyV8E-RQ2pZN/02.png) 5) you'll see something like this [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/USeBxRwGdK-yVTEpXVWPzt2Bziq7jtfp4RBuNSyhZinnq18-myA3Llkz-MKh79RsttNzOpWsBdRi5Xfql4AF2V49nr4fXMRV/03.png) 6) open Grasshopper/File/Special Folders/User Object Folder [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/USeBxRwGdK-2v4Ci*KAxH8VSm-ZgH16CSKVApl9Xyz5TIkR6LlxDFMcCMxClyhX8gjaWRPV07ZwHnQaqwOiAvgU97dEzOb3F/04.png) 7) Select and delete all Ladybug components [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/USeBxRwGdK*iuP062c5jRuFguzjzQjyFMDYJbSUk3ec3ZH3JyE2vD-4YF2*mjDYtKdQ46N6o48z-ovirwCi*skG9hc85vmNa/05.png) 8) Drag all components of the point 5) into the canvas of Grasshopper wherever you want or inside the "User Object Folder"... it is the same thing. And it should be fine. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/USeBxRwGdK-x7U1cbX5pJu3L*O1pLENZOgoJTA2RPFAElj2eh9od7ck*XbFIENjlK7sBBELuFBV57Y71CUBHw0NeKTDEmkBY/06.png) Let me know if it works. Best Antonello
